default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: There's nothing to be happy about catching someone like me, right? Keep going. Good luck on catching a better Sinner next time.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Wait. Do you think I'll stop being lazy when I get stronger?

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Yeah, I'm so strong now! Is it time for me to get myself killed in Black Rings?

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Stay close... I have to at least take you back alive.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Let's go. It's just a few corpses. Nothing interesting.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Ha... We can finally go home early.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: You can't escape!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Can't believe I got defeated here...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: You're not expecting me to say hello to you, are you? You must have got too much time...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: You've got a grindstone? Jon and Jay are getting blunt. Why do I name my weapons? Nothing special. I just think it's fun.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: You wanna chat with me? Don't... I don't wanna chat right now. You'd better chat with someone else.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: I can give you some odd jobs if you pay enough. Forget about fighting. I ain't good enough for that.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Hey, wanna make a deal? This week I'll do whatever you tell me to. I promise, no slacking off... Can you help me buy that Deadlover Radio special collection?

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Every time I see K.K., I feel like seeing myself from the pastâ€”it's too boring working all day long without any personal life. If I don't watch her, she will be sold by Bai Yi to pay off gambling debts sooner or later.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I know Bai Yi gets drunk, gambles, gets into trouble all the time, and calls me a dwarf when she gets drink too much... but she is the most interesting person in the world from the time I met her until now. It has always been the case.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: I'm surprised that you, as the Chief, with that face, didn't go suck up to those high officials instead of hanging out with a bunch of Sinners all day. You are an interesting one... Don't get me wrong. I didn't mean anything by that.

default.title: Idle
default.text: You tired? Take a nap then. Don't worry. I'll keep watch for you and won't let your men know their great Chief is slacking off.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Umm... Bro, what's your problem?

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Umm... Sis, what's your problem?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: You do your work, I take my nap. Let's not get in the way of each other, okay?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Can you ask someone else to go? I'm busy.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Let's leave it at this. I'm off now.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Tsk, what a pain.

default.title: Join Team
default.text: Ah... My eyes... They hurt... I'm gonna turn blind. Do you still want me to go like this? Geez.

unexpected_guest.title: Obtain Attire
unexpected_guest.text: Oh? It's just you. I'm working here. Whitestone just took on a debt collection job, and K.K. is in the middle of something else, so I had to come. I'm wearing this to look more like a badass. It's Bai Yi's idea, not mine.

unexpected_guest.title: Level Up
unexpected_guest.text: Not again? It's so tiring to fight and kill.

unexpected_guest.title: Greeting
unexpected_guest.text: The job is not done yet. Relax, I won't do anything nasty. He's open for business. If I sit here and stare at everyone, he'll want me to leave and give me the money in no time.

unexpected_guest.title: Ordinary Contact 1
unexpected_guest.text: Ugh, out of all the jobs they could've picked, they had to go for this debt collection gig, and of course, they forced me to do it... Well, if I can't get it done, so be it. It won't be the first job Whitestone couldn't finish anyway.

unexpected_guest.title: Ordinary Contact 2
unexpected_guest.text: If I keep sitting here, I'll be seen as their security guy. The only good thing here is free tea and snacks. Hey, you really not gonna have some?

unexpected_guest.title: Special Attention
unexpected_guest.text: What brings you here? Well, not like it's any of my business. If you have nothing better to do, it's good to sit here and get some vitamin D from the sun too.

unexpected_guest.title: Annoyed
unexpected_guest.text: Don't rub it. It's not a tattoo, it's just a sleeve. Why would I want to sting myself with some colorful needles?

unexpected_guest.title: Idle
unexpected_guest.text: Hey~ You don't seem so busy. Why not join us in the back to play mahjong? Don't worry, the boss here is my buddy, he won't charge us.
